snippet.title: Hunting Unlimited (2001) PC 1st-person Hunting Simulation
snippet.description:
►►►OPEN INFOBOX FOR MORE INFOS◄◄◄

On this channel you will find tons of first person games as an archive for ALL first person games ever published is created here. The videos show you the first 15-30 minutes of gameplay without any comment, as I don't want to influence anyone with my opinion. If you like a game, I almost always have links in the info box where you can get the game (legal) without much searching. If you like the channel, you are welcome to leave me a subscription. THX

Hunting Unlimited (2001) PC 1st-person Hunting Simulation

►Info:◄
https://www.mobygames.com/game/windows/hunting-unlimited

https://ogdb.eu/index.php?section=title&titleid=40450

https://www.igdb.com/games/hunting-unlimited

►The Hall:◄ --- German/Deutsch
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw/playlists?shelf_id=5&sort=dd&view=50

►The Hall:◄ --- English
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw/playlists?view=50&shelf_id=7&sort=dd

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

*►Other First Person Games from the developers "Sunstorm Interactive":◄*

Deer Hunter (1997)
https://youtu.be/0OB3Xy2lMnw 🇺🇸 

Bird Hunter - Waterfowl Edition (1998)
https://youtu.be/NvYamEa8UEQ 🇺🇸 

Deer Hunter 2 - The Hunt Continues (1998)
https://youtu.be/gNngi80detE 🇺🇸 

Rocky Mountain Trophy Hunter (1998)
https://youtu.be/tyRUAjRyYLc 🇺🇸 

Bird Hunter - Upland Edition (1999)
https://youtu.be/MsrsJGGK91A 🇺🇸 

Buckmasters Top Bow Championship (1999)
https://youtu.be/3PWwUfJZZZY 🇺🇸 

Deer Hunter 3 - The Legend Continues (1999)
https://youtu.be/Bp-0Cu3U3Rw 🇺🇸 

Rocky Mountain Trophy Hunter 2 - Above the Treeline (1999)
https://youtu.be/qv4DqZDWPWI 🇺🇸 

Wild Turkey Hunt (1999) 🇺🇸 
https://youtu.be/qa_Grac2aeE

Bird Hunter - Wild Wings Edition (2000)
https://youtu.be/gvO6kQTq5c8 🇺🇸 

Buckmasters Deer Hunting (2000)
https://youtu.be/FQfZc0GGusk 🇺🇸 

Deer Hunter 4 - World Class Record Bucks (2000)
https://youtu.be/w7FT4YhjE-U 🇺🇸 

High Impact Paintball (2000)
https://youtu.be/-r3aiO3Wqro 🇺🇸 

Sportsman's Paradise 2 (2000)
https://youtu.be/0j1wLw9zg0I 🇺🇸 

911 Fire Rescue (2001)
https://youtu.be/wE4K1Y6w_KU 🇺🇸 

B-17 Gunner - Air War Over Germany (2001)
https://youtu.be/5NcB5H6fiVs 🇺🇸 

Hunting Unlimited (2001)
https://youtu.be/OtV6gXgnRg4 🇺🇸 

Police Tactical Training (2001)
https://youtu.be/zmCNMdC26dM 🇺🇸 

Primal Prey (2001)
https://youtu.be/PyEWeTGsogw 🇺🇸 

Bird Hunter 2003 - Legendary Hunting (2002)
https://youtu.be/jNEjQ7Darlg 🇺🇸 

Carnivores - Cityscape (2002)
https://youtu.be/-8hszw0tcsI 🇺🇸 

Deer Hunter 2003 - Legendary Hunting (2002)
https://youtu.be/EYpI6BBBbxo 🇺🇸 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

►Gameplay:◄
0:26

►eBay U.S. (Affiliate link):◄
http://ebay.to/3cEGhmi

►eBay Germany (Affiliate link):◄
https://ebay.to/3anzGdw

►Abo / Sub:◄
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw?sub_confirmation=1

►Hall Support:◄

YouTube:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCg15o2O5-_TmS2RrQL8a1dw/join

G2A (Affiliate link) :
https://www.g2a.com/r/gr-5e68d48b2d24e
